name: Unheard-Of
description:
Unheard-Of is a platformer game which includes all that a platformer game should include, however, this game will get updated every week with new mechanics, including more powerful items and more levels however this is not certain as my school work and homework is my priority as game development is only a hobby to me, however, I am getting fond of this type of  game making.

EXTRA:
I am extremely sorry there is game maker studio 2 splash screen when you start the game I can only do this if I pay 100$ a year which I am still contemplating about doing so.
Thank you for reading and please add information in the comments what I should add next to this early access development.

gmail: astrocorporations@gmail.com
contact if you need to talk to me on a personal level, however, comment if you need something that is not too important.

Thanks,
AstrCorporation
